column3: Concept ACK, though IMO using named arguments is even more readable for ancillary arguments like timeout.\n

Agree, but note that the arguments _are_ variables with the name `timeout`, but are _not_ named arguments in `maxuploadtarget.py` and `p2p-mempool.py`. I don't think we can catch such issues during review in the future, we should probably force to name them...\n
